arthapal "arora": wiwidha wisthara, lakshana saha chayarupa - elawalu waththa - 2019 waguwa, madhyama aga arthapal "arora": wiwidhathwaya, lakshana saha chayarupa wisthara kirima rasawath gedara hadu kama piliyela kirima sandaha bhawitha kala haki wishishta mesa gunanga sahitha prabhedawalata oba kamathi nam, arora arthapal obata wadath sudusu wana athara pohosath aswanna saha wishala pramanaye mula boga pilibandawa oba nisakawama sathutu wanu atha.

inpa­suwa ehi wu pospet krushi­ka­rma­yata awashya rasa­ya­nika poho­rak lesa salaka pospet gal kudu­kara, bahu­ja­thika sama­ga­mwa­lata wiki­nime wada­pi­li­wela rajaya wisin sidu­kara atha. 1992 di aarambha kara athi mema sama­gama in idi­ri­yata gos awa­sana nishpa­da­na­yak kiri­mata pelambai aththe wasara 2005di pama­naya.

waradana waraprasada iwatha dama janatha balaporoththu sapala karanawa - prajathanthrawadi pakshaye nayaka sarath fonseka wilsan wicherathna - iththapana pasugiya wayambaa saha madhyama palath sabha mathiwaranawaladi manthri aasana 5 k laba ganimin jayagrahanaya kara idiriyata yamata haki wuye mathpan ho wenath thagibhoga labadimen nowa, janathawa apa wetha thaba athi balawath wishwasaya nisa yayi da owunge balaporoththu sarthaka kara ganima sandaha me rata dawasin dawasa passata yama walakwimata, nawa balawegaya kriyakaranu athayi prajathanthrawadi pakshaye nayaka sarath fonseka mahatha pawasiya.
